resources.string: What do you do with Organization\'s documents ?
Why should we trust your online donation ?
How can I make donations to Organizations ?
How do I put an event for my cause ?
How should NGO\'s ask for donations?
Why is it showing 0 in the verified option ?
How will users get to know that NGOs are verified, or you are displaying only verified NGOs ?
What actions will be taken for Fake Organizations or users ?
Does your app contain a feature to add events to the calendar ?

string-array.name: Q1
string-array.item: Transparency is at the top of mind for donors. It is crucial to verify organizations, are they existing or not to prevets charity from misuse and ensure that no one has access to data except us.

string-array.name: Q2
string-array.item: We can assure you that we are not taking or misusing any bit of it. It\'s the primary purpose of application to reduce the gap between donors and organizations by reducing the involvement of any 3rd party. Organizations will communicate you to accept donations, and you can directly give them. We are just medium to provide you this opportunity.

string-array.name: Q3
string-array.item: To make Donations, you have to log in as a donor, select checkboxes whatever you want to donate, click on the organization button to check the list of available NGOs according to requirement, and click on any NGO. You will get an option to donate.

string-array.name: Q4
string-array.item: After clicking on NGO\'s name, you will get an option to show details on the next page.

string-array.name: Q5
string-array.item: Just log in as a donor or Organization, and there you will find a Button for event creation. From there, you can host an event.

string-array.name: Q6
string-array.item: We are not restricting donations. Majorly we have given six options Food, Book, Clothes, Blood, Medicine, Money, but One can donate anything they want.

string-array.name: Q7
string-array.item: We are providing a list of previous and current donors with their details. From there, you can ask them for donations.

string-array.name: Q10
string-array.item: Firstly, we are verifying at our end. If any user or Organization is found guilty, we will delete those accounts from our application. The necessary action will be taken if required.

string-array.name: Q11
string-array.item: Yes, it is. You can add events to the calendar after clicking host events.

string-array.name: Q12
string-array.item: We are not restricting any one donors can check NGOs location, and if they found it suitable, they can donate.

string-array.name: state_names
string-array.item: Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu
